subtitle: A traditional Scottish chilled dessert of toasted oatmeal, raspberries and cream.

method.text: Mix together the oats, whisky and enough honey to sweeten. Lightly whip the cream, until it just stands in soft peaks.
Fold the raspberries into half the cream mixture. Spoon the oat mixture into the base and sides of individual serving dishes. Fill with the raspberry cream.
Top with the plain cream. Drizzle with any remaining honey. Decorate each crannachan with 1-2 raspberries and a sprig of fresh mint. Chill for 30 min, or until required.

title: Fruity crannachan
